## Paper
### FPS Game AI
- **Counter-Strike Deathmatch with Large-Scale Behavioural Cloning** [Arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2104.04258v2), [Code](https://github.com/TeaPearce/Counter-Strike_Behavioural_Cloning)
  - Tim Pearce, Jun Zhu
  - 9 Apr 2021
